thread.section_title: Zip-Lines Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zip-Lines Ireland | ziplines.ie
thread.title: Marc Corrigan
thread.title_full: Zip-Lines Ireland reviewed by Marc Corrigan

author: Marc Corrigan
title: Marc Corrigan
text: I purchased a Zipline almost 6 months ago from zip-lines Ireland it is a great product the kids spend hours on it and their friends love coming over they think it's so cool. The delivery and service from the company was great. This is a 5 star company would highly recommend them.
